title: La Semilla
subtitle: The Seed
meta_desc: Learn seed and plant growth vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, plants growing Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Semilla
pages.prompt: A child's hand holding tiny seeds over soil in a garden pot, ready to plant, professional photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La semilla necesita agua.

pages.title: La semilla necesita sol.

pages.title: La semilla crece.
